course.subject: NRE
course.course_title: PhD Seminar in Empirical Corporate Finance
course.class_descr: PhD Sem. in Emper Corp Finance

notes.note: NON-JOHNSON STUDENTS ONLY Add/Drop Dates: Non-Johnson Students: August 6th to September 7th (4:00pm) After September 7th a late add or drop of a full semester class requires a completed late add/drop form with the faculty member's signature. A late fee of $100.00 will be charged for each add or drop transaction. If you are dropping after October 12th you will also receive a "W" on your transcript in addition to the late fees.

NON-JOHNSON GRADUATE STUDENTS ONLY Add/Drop Dates: Non-Johnson Students: August 6th to September 7th (4:00pm) After September 7th a late add or drop of a full semester class requires a completed late add/drop form with the faculty member's signature. A late fee of $100.00 will be charged for each add or drop transaction. If you are dropping after October 12th you will also receive a "W" on your transcript in addition to the late fees.

course.subject: NRE
course.course_title: PhD Seminar in Empirical Asset Pricing
course.class_descr: PhD Sem in Emp. Asset Pricing

notes.note: Johnson Finance PhD Students must take as a Letter Grade. Add/Drop Dates: Non-Johnson Students: August 6th to September 7th (4:00pm) After September 7th a late add or drop of a full semester class requires a completed late add/drop form with the faculty member's signature. A late fee of $100.00 will be charged for each add or drop transaction. If you are dropping after October 12th you will also receive a "W" on your transcript in addition to the late fees. ** S/U or Letter Grade Only - NO AUDITS ALLOWED ** Deadline to Change Grading Option: Friday, October 12th (4:00pm)

course.subject: NRE
course.course_title: Doctoral Seminar - Introduction to Asset Pricing Theory
course.class_descr: PhD Sem: Intr to Asset Pricing

notes.note: Add/Drop Dates: Non-Johnson Students: October 15th (8:00am) to October 19th (4:00pm) You may add or drop a second-half semester class after October 19th with permission of the faculty. A late fee of $100.00 will be charged for each add or drop transaction. If you are dropping after November 2nd you will also receive a "W" on your transcript in addition to the late fees.
